title: ProjectDiscovery Lands $25M Investment for Cloud Security Tech
description:
San Francisco startup ProjectDiscovery has banked $25 million in early-stage financing as investors continue bet on cloud security vendors.

The post ProjectDiscovery Lands $25M Investment for Cloud Security Tech appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Google Brings AI Magic to Fuzz Testing With Eye-Opening Results
description:
Google sprinkles magic of generative-AI into its open source fuzz testing infrastructure and finds immediate success with code coverage.

The post Google Brings AI Magic to Fuzz Testing With Eye-Opening Results appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Rapid7 Says ROI for Ransomware Remains High; Zero-Day Usage Expands
description:
A new report from Rapid7 says a ransomware gang like Cl0p would easily be able to afford a bevy of zero-day exploits for vulnerable enterprise software.

The post Rapid7 Says ROI for Ransomware Remains High; Zero-Day Usage Expands appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Malicious QR Codes Used in Phishing Attack Targeting US Energy Company
description:
A widespread phishing campaign utilizing malicious QR codes has hit organizations in various industries, including a major energy company in the US.

The post Malicious QR Codes Used in Phishing Attack Targeting US Energy Company appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Cisco Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Enterprise Applications
description:
Cisco has patched high-severity vulnerabilities in enterprise applications that could lead to privilege escalation, SQL injection, and denial-of-service.

The post Cisco Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Enterprise Applications appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Thousands of Systems Turned Into Proxy Exit Nodes via Malware
description:
Threat actors have been observed deploying a proxy application on Windows and macOS systems that were infected with malware.

The post Thousands of Systems Turned Into Proxy Exit Nodes via Malware appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: CISA Releases Cyber Defense Plan to Reduce RMM Software Risks
description:
CISA has published a cyber defense plan outlining strategies to help critical infrastructure organizations reduce the risks associated with RMM software.

The post CISA Releases Cyber Defense Plan to Reduce RMM Software Risks appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Cybersecurity M&A Roundup for August 1-15, 2023
description:
Twenty-five cybersecurity-related M&A deals were announced in the first half of August 2023.

The post Cybersecurity M&A Roundup for August 1-15, 2023 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Exploitation of Citrix ShareFile Vulnerability Spikes as CISA Issues Warning
description:
Exploitation of a Citrix ShareFile vulnerability tracked as CVE-2023-24489 has spiked as CISA added it to its ‘must patch’ catalog.

The post Exploitation of Citrix ShareFile Vulnerability Spikes as CISA Issues Warning  appeared first on SecurityWeek.
